org.moeaframework.problem.tsplib

Class TSPPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class TSPPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Panel for displaying TSPLIB problem instances and tours.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • setAutoRepaint

        public void setAutoRepaint(boolean autoRepaint)
        Set to true if this graphical display should automatically repaint when the displayed tours are changed; false otherwise. When false, the display will only change when Component.repaint() is invoked or the component automatically repaints the panel. This is used to avoid unnecessary repaints when making many changes to this display.
        Parameters:
        autoRepaint - true if this graphical display should automatically repaint when the displayed tours are changed; false otherwise

      • displayTour

        public void displayTour(Tour tour)
        Adds a tour to this graphical display. The tour will be displayed using the default color.
        Parameters:
        tour - the tour to display

      • displayTour

                        java.awt.Paint paint)
        Adds a tour to this graphical display with the specified paint settings.
        Parameters:
        tour - the tour to display
        paint - the paint settings

        public void displayTour(Tour tour,
                        java.awt.Paint paint,

        Parameters:

        paint - the paint settings
        stroke - the line stroke settings

      • setInsets

        public void setInsets(java.awt.Insets insets)
        Sets the border around the graphical display. This border should be at least half the node width to ensure nodes are fully contained inside the panel.
        Parameters:
        insets - the border around the graphical display
